message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you. My starting price is $12000.  Let me know your thoughts!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Can we meet in the middle at $11000?

Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $10000 is tempting, I'm hoping we can reach a price closer to my initial offer. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $11500? Let's see if we can find common ground.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $11500, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11250. Can we make a deal at this price?
